original_text: And the men of Ephraim gathered themselves together, and went northward, and said unto Jephthah, Wherefore passedst thou over to fight against the children of Ammon, and didst not call us to go with thee? we will burn thine house upon thee with fire.
korean_text: 에브라임 사람들이 모여 북쪽으로 가서 입다에게 이르되 네가 암몬 자손과 싸우러 건너갈 때에 어찌하여 우리를 불러 너와 함께 가게 하지 아니하였느냐 우리가 반드시 너와 네 집을 불사르리라 하니

sentences.original_text: And the men of Ephraim gathered themselves together
Wherefore passedst thou over to fight against the children of Ammon
and didst not call us to go with thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 우리를 부르지 않고 너와 함께 가지 않았느냐?

sentences.original_text: we will burn thine house upon thee with fire.
